description:
Are you an experienced business operations leader looking to take your career to the next level? PayPal is seeking an organized and detail-oriented Senior Manager, Business Operations to join our team and support our evolving needs. As a Senior Manager, Business Operations, you will be expected to lead the development of operational strategies and processes, as well as manage a variety of projects and initiatives. You must be able to think strategically and possess a demonstrated track record of success in driving operational efficiency and improving customer experience. To be successful in this role, you must have excellent communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills.The ideal candidate will have a Bachelor's degree in business or related field, as well as 7+ years of experience in business operations, project management, or a related field. Additionally, you should have experience leading cross-functional teams, developing and implementing processes and procedures, and analyzing data. If you have a passion for driving efficiency and customer satisfaction, we would love to hear from you!

PayPal is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
